text: The elevator is out; you have heavy bags to get to the 10th floor.
A_text: Heave the bags onto your shoulders and charge up the stairs.
B_text: Carry the load at a steady, rhythmic pace, ignoring the strain.
C_text: Offer to carry a few items for an elderly neighbor who is also stuck.
D_text: Check in with the other stranded residents to keep morale high.

text: You receive an alert that your primary email has been hacked.
A_text: Trust your gut on the target and logically verify the breach source.
B_text: Methodically trace the login and create custom encryption.
C_text: Build a script to automate password resets with rapid efficiency.
D_text: Scan for subtle anomalies and lock down hardware tokens.

text: You see a transit guard being unfairly aggressive with a non-native speaker.
A_text: Record the badge number and stay rooted to the spot.
B_text: Physically step into the space to block the guard’s advance.
C_text: Intervene with a firm, steady hand to pull the victim away.
D_text: Speak up loudly and clearly, appealing to onlookers to witness.

text: You’re offered a high-paying job in a city you genuinely dislike.
A_text: Accept the role but maintain a strict internal barrier.
B_text: Consider the social impact and research long-term career growth.
C_text: Negotiate a "digital nomad" clause for remote work.
D_text: Breakdown cost versus salary and negotiate a tech stipend.

text: A storm knocks a large limb onto an empty car; people are just standing around.
A_text: Identify structural weak points and use a lever to roll the limb.
B_text: Climb onto the debris to chop it into manageable pieces.
C_text: Scan for power lines first, then lead a coordinated heavy lift.
D_text: Keep pulling at the branches until clear, refusing to quit.

text: A flash flood has stranded several commuters on top of their cars in the street.
A_text: Carry the most vulnerable to higher ground one by one.
B_text: Take charge of the crowd to prevent panic with authority.
C_text: Analyze the flow and direct people to the safest path.
D_text: Rig a makeshift lifeline and reassure those who are stranded.

text: Your home security system alerts you to a forced entry while you are inside.
A_text: Trust your instincts and move through the house with fluid grace.
B_text: Watch the security feed and listen for intruder movement.
C_text: Barricade the door and hold the line, bracing for impact.
D_text: Move quickly to retrieve a tool and prepare for physical force.

text: You are lost in an unfamiliar city at night, and your phone battery just died.
A_text: Spot a transit map and trust your direction to walk back.
B_text: Maintain a brisk walk with a poker face to avoid being a target.
C_text: Use your imposing stride to keep trouble at a distance.
D_text: Stop at a hotel lobby and explain the situation to the concierge.

text: You witness a hit-and-run in a parking lot; the driver is speeding away.
A_text: Snap a burst of photos and calculate the car’s exit route.
B_text: Rush to the victim's side to provide first aid and call for help.
C_text: Focus intensely on the driver’s face and license plate.
D_text: Logically recall the make and model while securing the scene.

text: A colleague is being publicly berated by a toxic manager in the office.
A_text: Create a loud, physical distraction to break the manager's momentum.
B_text: Slip a supportive note to the colleague and confront the manager later.
C_text: Watch the room’s reaction silently to make the manager stop.
D_text: Sit with the colleague afterward and listen to them vent.

text: An aggressive stray dog is blocking the only path to your front door.
A_text: Use a large object as a barrier and find a way to redirect the dog.
B_text: Use a distraction, like keys or a toy, to lure the animal away.
C_text: Move past with steady movements, ready to react if it lunges.
D_text: Read the body language for fear and use a reassuring tone.

text: You’re at a very high class social gala and spill a drink on a prominent guest.
A_text: Hold your head high and shrug it off with absolute confidence.
B_text: Explain how the stain can be treated and help with cleanup.
C_text: Turn the accident into a clever opening for a business pitch.
D_text: Blot the liquid with speed and offer a professional apology.

text: You are stuck in an elevator during a heatwave with three panicked strangers.
A_text: Identify the person most likely to faint and focus on helping them.
B_text: Lean against the wall and endure the heat in silence.
C_text: Use body weight to force doors and build a makeshift fan.
D_text: Convince the group help is coming while you manipulate wires.

text: A local gym challenges you to a "Last Person Standing" endurance trial for a prize.
A_text: Tune out the noise and watch competitors for signs of fatigue.
B_text: Encourage the person next to you to fuel your own endurance.
C_text: Project an air of invincibility to make others want to quit.
D_text: Ration energy mathematically; failure is not an option.

text: You find a wallet full of cash with no ID, just a business card for a high-end members only club
A_text: Use the card to find a digital guest list with a straight face.
B_text: Search the wallet for a receipt to track the owner out of kindness.
C_text: Notice the unique scent or wear and trust your luck to find them.
D_text: Wait by the entrance, deducing the owner will return to look.

text: You are participating in a muddy, 10-mile "Obstacle Course" race for charity.
A_text: Vault over walls and scramble through mud with raw power.
B_text: Fix your gaze on the finish line with hyper-awareness.
C_text: Maintain a steady pace that outlasts the faster runners.
D_text: Stop to help a teammate through a climb with your own strength.

text: A localized earthquake has caused a shelving unit to pin a person in a store.
A_text: Command the crowd to lift the shelf with absolute certainty.
B_text: Assess ceiling instability and calmly coordinate the rescue.
C_text: Fashion a temporary brace and talk to the victim to keep them alert.
D_text: Reach into the gap with precision, trusting your luck.

text: You’re at a high-pressure press conference defending a controversial project.
A_text: Anticipate trick questions and counter with technical logic.
B_text: Stand under fire for hours, using analogies to deflect criticism.
C_text: Use your powerful voice to command the room and stay alert.
D_text: Defend your position with belief, refusing to back down.

text: You are "urban exploring" in a derelict building when the floor gives way in front of you.
A_text: Catch yourself on a beam and pull up with an explosive movement.
B_text: Warn your partner to stay back and resolve to find a way out.
C_text: Stand perfectly still on the edge while looking for a new path.
D_text: Recall blueprints and guide the group to the safest area.

text: A heavy safe in your office contains vital documents, but the keypad is fried.
A_text: Attempt a social engineering call while hoping for a default code.
B_text: Take the keypad apart to bridge wires using electronic knowledge.
C_text: Look for wear on the buttons and build a tool to bypass the lock.
D_text: Spend the night drilling with steady, unwavering precision.
